# Rodentia
Rodentia are a race of humanoid beings resembling rodents. Resourceful, evasive, sneaky, but fragile.
They natively speak the Rodentian language.
## Diet
- Can eat raw meat. - Can metabolize Gastrotoxin and Mold without getting sick, while deriving hunger in the process. - Will get poisoned by Theobromine (Chocolate, Tea, Coffee) and Allicin (Onion, Garlic).
## Benefits
- Uses their claws to do some Slashing and Blunt damage. - Smaller than humans. - Can fit in duffelbags.
## Special
- Can Rummage in disposal chutes, which can sometimes dig up food. - Can store small items in their cheeks. Having items in their mouth makes their speech unintelligible, and they will drop all items in their mouth if attacked, stunned, or shoved.
## Drawbacks
- Takes 30% more Blunt damage, and 15% more Slash and Piercing damage. - Always triggers mousetraps, regardless of whether or not they are wearing shoes. - Gets hungry 33% faster.
